#summary Project description for Howler Android

= Introduction =

Howler is an ActionScript MP3 player written using the Adobe Integrated Runtime (AIR) platform.  

= Details =

*Application Features:*

  * Loads MP3 sound file from the Android file system.
  * Displays ID3 meta-data.
  * Displays visual representation of spectrum waveform.
  * Redraws display for device tilting.
